summary: Texas is the second largest state in the United States.
full_text:
Dimmitt  is a city and county seat in Castro County, Texas, United States. The population was 4,393 at the 2010 census.
^ "American FactFinder". United States Census Bureau. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "US Board on Geographic Names". United States Geological Survey. 2007-10-25. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ http://www.texastripper.com/pronounce/locations-d.html
^ "Geographic Identifiers: 2010 Census Summary File 1 : Dimmitt city, Texas". U.S. Census Bureau, American Factfinder. Retrieved July 24, 2015.
title: Dimmitt, Texas
